doc.short_description: Calls the righ method for dataset_source

dataset_source.description:
The source of the dataset. 
Possible values include 'FLDAS'

path.description: The path to the directory containing the netCDF files

flagP.description: Name of the variable of interest as declared in the file

min_lon.description: Minimum longitude for the bounding box

max_lon.description: Maximum longitude for the bounding box

min_lat.description: Minimum latitude for the bounding box

max_lat.description: Maximum latitude for the bounding box

min_month.description: The first month of the season of interest

max_month.description: The last month of the season of interest

year.description: The year of interest for the comparison

doc.long_description:
This function takes the seasonal average over several years 
to estimate the climatology and deviation for a specipic year.
Works only for FLDAS monthly datasets.
doc.short_description: Calculate climatology for the FLDAS data

path.description: The path to the directory containing the netCDF files

flagP.description: Name of the variable of interest as declared in the file

min_lon.description: Minimum longitude for the bounding box

max_lon.description: Maximum longitude for the bounding box

min_lat.description: Minimum latitude for the bounding box

max_lat.description: Maximum latitude for the bounding box

min_month.description: The first month of the season of interest

max_month.description: The last month of the season of interest

year.description: The year of interest for the comparison

returns.description:
The average for all years
'summary.txt': The probability for a specific year
